%%{init: {'theme':'base'}}%%
xychart-beta
    title "Skills Assessment (Radar View)"
    x-axis ["Communication", "Technical", "Leadership", "Problem Solving", "Creativity", "Communication", "Technical", "Leadership", "Problem Solving", "Creativity"]
    y-axis "Value"
    bar [85, 75, 90, 80, 70, 85, 75, 90, 80, 70]
description: Data extracted from user request for Skills Assessment showing a downward trend from 85.00 to 70.00
insights: Peak at Leadership (90.00), lowest at Creativity (70.00)
